coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: Kichik hajmli, kuchli qahva. Konsentratsiyasi yuqori.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: Espresso va bug‘langan sut bilan aralashtirilgan klassik qahva.

coffees.name: Latte
coffees.description: Sutli, yumshoq va shirin ta’mli qahva. Nonushta uchun ideal.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: Suv bilan suyultirilgan espresso. Yengil ichimlik.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: Qahva, shokolad va sut aralashmasidan iborat shirin ichimlik.

coffees.name: Flat White
coffees.description: Lattega o‘xshash, ammo ko‘proq qahva kamroq sut bilan tayyorlanadi.
